entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 7:35 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:35 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
